page.title: 05 Wellow to a new resident.
page.content: Mr.Lumsdaine and his wife have four children.They all attend a local school in Romsey.Mr.Lumsdaine and his family have lived in West Wellow for eight years.They came to live in Wellow because of its rural situation,but it also has good communications,to Southampton for his work.The village has a great deal of facilities to offer for all ages.The residents are very friendly and helpful.There are only four shops in West Wellow but these are quite sufficient.All the residents would like to see an improvement in the bus service of West Wellow.There are only four buses each day,to Romsey, Southampton and Salisbury. By Michelle Butler.
